mapper.select: select h.attribute_varchar1 from spfm_company_basic h where h.company_id = #{companyId} and h.group_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT l.wbs FROM sprm_pr_line l WHERE l.pr_line_id = #{prLineId} AND l.wbs_code = #{wbsCode}
SELECT l.wbs_code FROM sprm_pr_line l WHERE l.pr_line_id = #{prLineId} AND l.wbs = #{wbs}
SELECT h.budget_account_num FROM smdm_budget_account h WHERE h.budget_account_id = #{budgetAccountId}
SELECT h.budget_account_name FROM smdm_budget_account h WHERE h.budget_account_id = #{budgetAccountId}
